sentences.en: Any atlas , containing many pages of maps, normally includes an index, called a gazetteer.
sentences.cn: 任何载有多幅地图的地图集, 一般都附有一份地名索引.

sentences.en: ATLAS is an of excellent general - purpose language for system testing, provided with hardware - independent characteristics.
sentences.cn: Atlas语言是一种非常出色的通用测试系统语言, 具有设备无关性.

sentences.en: Even a worldwide atlas shrugging will be interpreted several ways.
sentences.cn: 甚至会有世界范围内的不屑一顾.

sentences.en: For all practical purposes a ballistic missile such as Atlas is guided to its target.
sentences.cn: 根据各种实用目的,可使象“阿特拉斯”这样的弹道导弹导向其目标.

sentences.en: He also feared that a map in the atlas, along with news accounts repeating an error in the news release, could pull climate scientists into another vortex of damaging controversy.
sentences.cn: 他还担心新闻评述会同地图集里的地图一道，在新闻发布的时候，一而再再而三地犯着同一个错误，反而将气象学家们拉入争辩的漩涡之中。

sentences.en: He reached down the atlas from the top shelf.
sentences.cn: 他从书架顶层取下地图集.

sentences.en: Indispensable for the observer is a good star atlas, containing all naked eye stars.
sentences.cn: 观测者必须具备一份包括肉眼能看到的所有天体的好星图.

sentences.en: It hopes to publish a global foodborne disease burden report and atlas in 2011–12.
sentences.cn: 它希望在2011-12年发布一份全球食品传播疾病负担报告和地图集。

sentences.en: It was the realm of King Atlas, whose bulk surpassed that of all other men.
sentences.cn: 这是阿特拉斯国王的国土,阿特拉斯长得五大三粗, 天下无双.

sentences.en: Kratos is released from Atlas'grasp as the Titan laughs humorously.
sentences.cn: 泰坦松开捏住奎托斯的手指,幽默地笑起来.

sentences.en: Please reach ( me ) the atlas down from the bookshelf.
sentences.cn: 请把那本地图册从书架上取下来 ( 递给我 ).

sentences.en: Red sits with an atlas, tracing his finger down the page.
sentences.cn: 瑞德坐着拿着本地图册, 用手指着看.

sentences.en: That book on the desk is an atlas.
sentences.cn: 桌上的那本书是地图册.

sentences.en: The atlas contains forty maps, including three of Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 这本地图集有40幅地图, 其中包括3幅英国地图.

sentences.en: The atlas should help the eradication fight by letting health officials know just where the problem areas are.
sentences.cn: 而这些地图集刚好能帮助卫生局高清楚问题地区所在，然后将虫虫们斩草除根。

sentences.en: The atlas was published by our company.
sentences.cn: 这个地图集是由我们公司出版的。

sentences.en: The high pressure over the Atlas Mountains makes the climate dry in summer.
sentences.cn: 此高原上空的高气压使夏季的气候干燥.
这是一本有权威性的地图册.

phrases.tran_cn: 阿特拉斯山脉（阿尔卑斯山系的一部分）

trans.tran_en: a book containing maps, especially of the whole world
